text:
Hi Craig, it is such a pleasure to meet you! Thank you for becoming my e-mentor!
It was really surprising to see your name in this channel as I have read a few interview articles about you in the past, and you have been in the industry for quite a while now (and worked on some amazing projects, that's so cool!).

To introduce myself, I'm a final year student at the university of hertfordshire, and currently I'm specialising in groom. This summer I spent learning Houdini ( and still am :grin: ), and I looked a bit into creature effects/done some tests, which really caught my interest, so I will be doing groom (and hair sim in Semester B) on a couple of student film projects. I am still not sure which path I should follow, as I feel more confident in groom, but cfx interests me as well; It would be amazing if you could guide me through hair sim process, and anything cfx related, really :blush:
